name: Ancient Evil (itch)
description:
The year is 1936. German scientists have opened a dimensional rift in their pursuit of the occult, however, they weren’t exactly expecting the horrors lying beyond...

Choose one of 3 characters, each with distinct starting weapon and attributes. Play either the story mode with linear progression and multiple enemy encounters, or try to survive all waves in the arena mode.

Made as a school project in 2 semesters.
